title: Complex Multi-Place Drills
goal: Practice `vecnu` and `klama` with all places filled.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Vocabulary check:

1. hungry → ?
2. thirsty → ?
3. fear → ?
4. tired → ?

(Answers: xagji, taske, terpa, tatpi)

New Material (5-7 min)

Full Place Structure Practice

vecnu — Four Places

vecnu — x1 (seller) sells x2 (goods) to x3 (buyer) for x4 (price)

Full sentence:

mi vecnu la karce la .bob. mu no no

I sell a car to Bob for 500.

All conversions:

Version x1 = Sentence
vecnu seller mi vecnu la karce la .bob. mu no no
se vecnu goods la karce se vecnu mi la .bob. mu no no
te vecnu buyer la .bob. te vecnu la karce mi mu no no
ve vecnu price mu no no ve vecnu la karce la .bob. mi

klama — Five Places

klama — x1 (goer) goes to x2 (dest) from x3 (origin) via x4 (route) using x5 (vehicle)

Full sentence:

mi klama la zarci la zdani la dargu la karce

I go to the market from home via the road by car.

All conversions:

Version x1 =
klama goer
se klama destination
te klama origin
ve klama route
xe klama vehicle

Mix Conversions and Tags

You can combine approaches:

la karce xe klama fe la .paris. fi la .london. fa mi

The car is the vehicle for going to Paris from London by me.

Key Point

Complex gismu require comfort with all places. Practice filling every slot.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)
sections.keyPoint: Complex gismu require comfort with all places. Practice filling every slot.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Fill All vecnu Places

Translate with all four places:

  1. I sell a book to Alice for 25.
  2. Bob sells a computer to me for 300.
  3. You sell a chair to Tom for 40.
Answers
  1. mi vecnu la cukta la .alis. re mu
  2. la .bob. cu vecnu la skami mi ci no no
  3. do vecnu la stizu la .tam. vo no

Exercise 2: Fill All klama Places

Translate:

  1. I go to Paris from London via the road by car.
  2. Alice goes to the market from home via the road by car.
Answers
  1. mi klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la karce
  2. la .alis. cu klama la zarci la zdani la dargu la karce

Exercise 3: Apply Different Conversions

Take: mi vecnu la cukta la .bob. mu no

Write four versions:

  1. Seller focus (original)
  2. Goods focus (se)
  3. Buyer focus (te)
  4. Price focus (ve)
Answers
  1. mi vecnu la cukta la .bob. mu no
  2. la cukta se vecnu mi la .bob. mu no
  3. la .bob. te vecnu la cukta mi mu no
  4. mu no ve vecnu la cukta la .bob. mi

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I sell a car to you for 1000." → mi vecnu la karce do pa no no no
  2. "I go to Paris from London by train." → mi klama la .paris. la .london. zo'e la .treni.
  3. "500 is the price of the computer." → mu no no ve vecnu la skami

Today's Vocab

No new gismu — focus on complex place drilling.

Reference:

Gismu Places
vecnu seller, goods, buyer, price
klama goer, dest, origin, route, vehicle

Summary

You practiced filling all places of vecnu (4) and klama (5), then applied all conversions to each.
